item.title: Improving VirtualBox performance
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I run VirtualBox on an Ubuntu 64-bit Host with a 32-bit Windows XP guest.

item.title: Malfunctioning mouse after upgrade to Ubuntu 8.10
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I experienced some intermittent and infuriating mouse malfunctions after my upgrade to Ubuntu 8.

item.title: Connecting to Netscreen Series (NetScreen-5) VPN with Ubuntu 9.04 (Jaunty - AMD64)
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I recently struggled through the details of establishing a VPN connection from my Ubuntu 64 desktop to a Juniper Networks Netscreen-5.

item.title: Resolving Synergy mouse issues with Firefox after upgrade to Ubuntu 8.04
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: My desktop runs Ubuntu (64-bit) and I use Synergy to drive its keyboard and mouse over to various clients like my MacBook Pro.

item.title: Removing duplicate music files with different names from a large directory free
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: During a recent Mac migration, I hosed my iTunes library and unintentionally generated hundreds of duplicate songs (the actual media files).

item.title: avahi-daemon blocks nfsd on Ubuntu
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I just spent a morning attempting to fix a NFS mounting configuration that had been working flawlessly for over 6 months.

item.title: Java webbrowser plugin for AMD64 Ubuntu
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: There is now (finally) a fix for Java applet support on AMD64 Ubuntu.

item.title: Mounting an Ubuntu NFS share on RedHat Enterprise with firewalls on both
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: It can be tough making NFS play nice amongst different distros and firewalls.
